1. py.testÂ¶

py.test is a tool for:

  • rapidly writing unit- and functional tests in Python
  • writing tests for non-python code and data
  • receiving useful reports on test failures
  • distributing tests to multiple CPUs and remote environments

quickstart: for getting started immediately.

features: a walk through basic features and usage.

plugins: using available plugins.

extend: writing plugins and advanced configuration.

distributed testing how to distribute test runs to other machines and platforms.
